titles.title: A resolution congratulating the American Dental Association for sponsoring the 4th annual "Give Kids a Smile" program, which emphasizes the need to improve access to dental care for children, and thanking dentists for volunteering their time to help provide needed dental care.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 2/7/2006--Passed Senate without amendment. Congratulates the American Dental Association for establishing and sponsoring the Give Kids a Smile program (held on February 3, 2006). Emphasizes the need to improve access to dental care for children. Thanks the dentists, dental hygienists, dental assistants, and others who volunteered their time for the program.
